column3: immediately preceded Yestarë and was the last day of the year in the calendars of the Elves and the Dúnedain. In the Reckoning of Rivendell
column4: Mettarë fell more or less on 5 April in the Shire Calendar. In the Kings Reckoning and Stewards Reckoning it corresponded with 1 Yule in the Shire Calendar
column5: around the winter solstice. In the New Reckoning it corresponded with 24 March in the Shire Calendar.
